message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $110. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but the product is worth a bit more to me. How about we meet in the middle at $100?
I understand your perspective, but I'm still a bit hesitant. Would you be willing to go down to $95? I really like the product, but I need to stay within my budget.
